word_mean: 麻痹的，瘫痪的：有关或发生麻痹的

sentence.Network_en: By the end of the evening they were all absolutely paralytic.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上结束时，他们全都酩酊大醉。

sentence.Network_en: She was / got completely paralytic last night.
sentence.Network_cn: 她昨天晚上喝得酩酊大醉.

sentence.Network_en: She rose and hobbled to me on her paralytic legs and kissed me.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站起来,拖着她那麻痹的双腿一瘸一拐地走到我身边,吻了吻我.

list.abs: 摘要: 【关键词】 糖尿病高血压麻痹性斜视护理麻痹性斜视(paralytic strabismus)是由于神经核、神经干或眼外肌本身器质性病变引起的,可以是单根或多根眼外肌.
麻痹性痴呆(Paralytic dementia)就是神经梅毒的一种典型表现。在19世纪,麻痹性...会将当年的诺贝尔医学奖授予贾雷格,理由为“他发现了疟疾在治疗麻痹性痴呆中的.

3、麻痹性睑外翻(paralytic ectropion): 仅见于下睑,由于面神经麻痹,眼轮匝肌收缩功能丧失,下睑依其本身的重量下垂面形成外翻。 4、老年性睑外翻(senile.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French paralytique, via Latin from Greek paralutikos 'relating to paralysis' (see paralysis)

entry.def: Paralytic means suffering from or related to paralysis.
Someone who is paralytic is very drunk.

example.ex: By the end of the evening they were all absolutely paralytic.
example.tran: 晚上结束时，他们全都酩酊大醉。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or of the nature of paralysis;
2. affected or subject to with paralysis

auth_sentence.content: He glanced...at his shabby clothes and paralytic limb.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He glanced...at his shabby clothes and paralytic limb.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, depression is rather paralytic.
